description: Learn InVision Studio, a high-fidelity prototyping and animation tool.

slides.title: What is InVision Studio?
slides.content:
# InVision Studio üé•

While InVision started as a web platform for linking screens, **Studio** is their desktop design app.

Key focus:
- **Advanced Animation:** Best-in-class timeline editor.
- **Responsive Design:** Adaptive layout engine.
- **Prototyping:** Built directly into the design workflow.

slides.title: Motion Design Focus
slides.content:
# Motion Design üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

InVision Studio's superpower is motion.

While other tools offer simple transitions (slide, fade), Studio gives you a **Timeline**.

- Control delay and duration of specific elements.
- Adjust easing curves.
- Animate individual layers during a page transition.

slides.title: Responsive Layouts
slides.content:
# Adaptive Layout üìê

Design once, scale everywhere.

- **Percentage-based geometry:** Define width as 50% instead of 500px.
- **Pinning:** Pin an element to the right or bottom.
- **Stacks:** Automatically distribute space between items.

slides.title: Interactions
slides.content:
# Complex Interactions üëÜ

Beyond just clicking.

- **Swipe / Drag:** Create Tinder-like card swipes.
- **Hover & Touch:** Distinguish between mouse over and touch down.
- **Double Click:** Specific triggers for desktop apps.
- **Timed:** Auto-advance screens.

slides.quizQuestion: What is InVision Studio's primary strength compared to vanilla Sketch?

slides.title: Shared Components
slides.content:
# Components üì¶

Similar to other tools, Studio has a component system.

- **Overrides:** Change text/images in instances.
- **Libraries:** Sync components across designs using the InVision Cloud.

slides.title: InVision Cloud Integration
slides.content:
# The Ecosystem ‚òÅÔ∏è

Studio works seamlessly with InVision Cloud.

- **Freehand:** Real-time whiteboard for brainstorming before designing.
- **Inspect:** Handoff to developers (get CSS, colors, fonts).
- **Boards:** Create mood boards and style guides.

slides.title: User Testing
slides.content:
# InVision Cloud Testing üïµÔ∏è

Once you upload your prototype to the Cloud:

- **Comment Mode:** Stakeholders click anywhere to leave notes.
- **Tour Points:** Guide users through the design.
- **User Testing:** Record users navigating your link.

slides.title: Vector Editing
slides.content:
# Vector Tools ‚úíÔ∏è

It is a full design tool, not just an animator.

- **Pen Tool:** Draw custom shapes.
- **Masking:** Hide parts of images/shapes.
- **Boolean:** Unite, subtract, intersect shapes.
- **Path Operations:** Flatten paths for export.

slides.title: Device Preview
slides.content:
# Mirroring üì±

Preview your designs in real-time.

- Download the **InVision App** on iOS/Android.
- Scan the QR code from Studio.
- Interact with swipes and taps exactly as they would feel on the native device.

slides.title: Tool Quiz
slides.quizQuestion: Which InVision tool is a virtual whiteboard for brainstorming?

slides.title: Versioning
slides.content:
# Version History ‚è≥

InVision Cloud tracks history.

- **Restore:** Go back to a previous version of the prototype.
- **Sync:** Changes in Studio update the Cloud prototype automatically (if synced).

slides.title: Summary
slides.content:
# Recap: InVision Studio üéì

Motion and Interaction.

- **Timeline:** Keyframe animation for UIs.
- **Adaptive:** Responsive layouts built-in.
- **Interactions:** Swipes, drags, and timing.
- **Cloud:** Inspect, Freehand, and Testing integration.
